XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle quiz_gradingcustoms plugin

TABLE.NAME: gradingform_customgraders
TABLE.COMMENT: Grading information about a single grading for a single essay question submission.

FIELD.NAME: usageid
FIELD.COMMENT: The grading usage this grade belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: slot
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the item slot that is being graded

FIELD.NAME: grade_main
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical grade main teacher for this assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: grade_subs
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical grade substitute teacher for this assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: grade_head
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical grade head teacher for this assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: grade_final
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical final grade for this assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: max_diff
FIELD.COMMENT: The max difference grade between main teacher and substitute teacher.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of grade. 1 is final, 0 is intermediary

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: This records when the grade was added and is also used for keeping the order of graders.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this grade.

KEY.NAME: grader_main
KEY.COMMENT: The grader main this grade was added by.

KEY.NAME: grader_subs
KEY.COMMENT: The grader subs this grade was added by.

KEY.NAME: grader_head
KEY.COMMENT: The grader head this grade was added by.
